string-array.name: rave_obligation_descriptions
string-array.item: All attendees must be 18+ and present a valid government-issued ID at the entrance. No refunds will be issued for underage attendees denied entry.
rav2B promotes unity, mutual respect, and a safe atmosphere for all. Disruptive or aggressive behavior toward staff or guests will lead to immediate removal without refund.
Tickets are non-transferable and must match the ID used during purchase. Reselling or sharing tickets is strictly prohibited.
All guests must comply with club safety procedures, including bag checks and security screening. Illegal substances and unauthorized recording are banned.

rav2B enforces a strict black-only dress code. Guests must wear all-black outfits—colorful or brightly patterned clothing is not permitted. Entry will be denied to those who do not respect the club’s dark, unified aesthetic.
